snippet: Westlake Chemical says it has raised its unsolicited bid for the Georgia Gulf Corporation to $1.2 billion, an offer that has already been rejected.
abstract: Westlake Chemical says it has raised its unsolicited bid for the Georgia Gulf Corporation to $1.2 billion, an offer that has already been rejected.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: The Westlake Chemical Corporation said on Wednesday that it had raised its unsolicited bid for the Georgia Gulf Corporation to $1.2 billion, an offer that has already been rejected.

headline.main: Westlake Raises Bid for Georgia Gulf to $1.2 Billion
